name: Tabletop Towers
description:
NOTE: fullscreen game for it to work in browser. Sorry for the wierd page layout, scroll to see the fullscreen button.

WELCOME WELCOME ONE AND ALL!

To the most exciting tabletop game ever made. Manage your dice, think quick and act fast - and you might just be able to defeat an endless onslaught of game pieces. 

We hope to challenge your quick thinking skills and put you under pressure, so you will have no time to waste once the game is on!
